website_summaries.verdict: A quality wig cap that's easy to put on and hides hair away seamlessly. Available in different colors.
pros: Package includes two nylon wig caps
Easy to apply with a non-slip elastic design
Thick band reduces pressure around the head, making this a comfortable cap to wear
Plenty of material to tuck hair away
cons: Some users find this cap too small in circumference

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR, FOLKS.
customer_reviews.text: Thin, and they stretch to cover, initially. After an hour or so the one I was wearing lost all holding integrity. If you are looking for nylon footsies for your elephant, this is for you. Slipped off my hair (my long and heavy hair was tied up). Yeah, Dumbo's stocking hung out the back of my wig, even when accompanying a wig gripping band. Yip, yip. I was a smash at the party, beat out the guy with the lampshade. Might work for pinheads, but not a giant melon head like me. So, yeah, it let loose like a bright clown balloon gone wild, caught flapping in the wind. Maybe I'm too expressive, but I don't trust these things.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for long hair
customer_reviews.text: Not very good for folks with hair past the chin. If you have long hair, you need to use a wig cap that has an opening on both ends so you have place on end on your head, bend in it in the middle and place the other end on your head. This will be a much sturdier way to captivate all of the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Koopa Mcthunder

customer_reviews.title: Empty package
customer_reviews.text: After cutting open the package I realized it appears it was never sealed closed. I received an empty package.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great for under wigs!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I throw 1-2 costume parties a year, and these were the perfect find! I have a lot of hair and often struggle to fit it all in caps, or it fits but the cap sags horribly. These were perfect! They easily held all my hair, fit tightly on my head and were in great condition for another wear. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Faith D.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Great thickness: my nails didn’t go through the fabric like with others. Comfortably stretches to fit. It smoothed out my hair nicely. This cap made it so much easier and comfortable to put on the wig and made the wig fit better. A must have under any wig!
customer_reviews.author: Mostly Maven

customer_reviews.title: Best wig cap ever!
customer_reviews.text: This wig cap is the best ever. I have long, thick hair and I was able to keep the bulging hair at a minimum with these caps. Super stretchy and tight. Wouldn't recommend wearing for long periods of time, as it does get a little itchy on the forehead. Keeps all the little hairs around the edges of your hairline, in place.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight!
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all - very tight and I have fine short hair - someone with thicker longer hair wouldn’t be able to get it on! I threw it away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncust

customer_reviews.title: Strong and functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to keep my hair out of a mask zipper and for under wigs. The material is surprisingly sturdy. I got it caught in the zipper once and it didn't rip at all. it's also thick enough to mimic a scalp even over dark hair.
customer_reviews.author: AshNight1214

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: So these does what I need them to do but one of the wig caps came already ripped therefore I couldn't use it. But the one that I could use is fine for now
customer_reviews.author: Kennesha chambers

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Had Ordered
customer_reviews.text: I'm always in need of wig caps and figured why not give this a shot, for the price I ordered 4 of the fair toned and 4 of the medium toned. I did not receive what I had ordered. Instead of 4 fair toned wig caps, I received two "iAnder Premium Tempered Glass Screen Protectors" and have no way to return them, hopefully the other 4 caps I ordered in medium tone arrive and are what I was under the impression I was ordering. I am disappointed, but there's nothing I can do now except add my two cents to help future purchasers. Hope others receive what they ordered and not something different.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Head cap, check!
customer_reviews.text: Never wore wig, so I didnt end up using this. Probably would serve its purpose, but very basic material and fit. Good for price!
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Firstly I think that it is very thin but it’s good enough for a work/school day but not for the entire day. It’s stretch’s out Nicely and can hold long hair. It falls off if a wig or hat is taken off unless it’s taken off slowly. Overal it is very good for the price. ( by the way I didn’t use wig glue)
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Better for smaller heads, but still get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: These are worth the money but feel a little small it certainly leaves a nice red mark on my skin after a few minutes. If wearing for multiple hours it may start to hurt. So if you have a smaller head then these are good for you. They still work and are well made.
customer_reviews.author: SilverGemini

customer_reviews.title: Fits my melon head and is breathable--works great for cosplay!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my melon head and is breathable--works great for cosplay!
customer_reviews.author: Karolina Krason

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: The wig cap seem to be cheaply made. It would not stay in place. I used it under a cap but moved continuously, I would not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Shocked by Size

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know how these would fit. I have a smaller sized head and these seem to for VERY tight.
customer_reviews.author: a.buck921

customer_reviews.title: It's ok:/
customer_reviews.text: I'm do recommend hair nets and not a full piece it's harder to get your hair in and the feeling is wierd also is right around the head.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: I like having these since they are easy to wear especially if you have shorter hair, if you have longer hair you may want to braid your hair before you wear the wig cap, that will help a lot more. I had medium to long hair and it was slightly hard getting my hair up and back but i managed.
customer_reviews.author: Aster Sage Rose

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my wig caps and they have a comfortable fit and the quality is a little thin but it's perfect because I have a shorter cut of hair the fit is really comfortable and snug I definitely would but these for my self again . But if you have longer and bulky hair I don't recommend this because I almost guarantee it would rip.
customer_reviews.author: Jalen garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Received early, they fit me and also fit my 2 year old. They stretch perfectly and are also small enough for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Good Cap
customer_reviews.text: Works well but I do have to layer two wig caps since I have a lot of hair. I was worried it would rip since I saw many comments saying that, but I was relieved it didn’t! Just wish there were more color options since it doesn’t match my skin tone, so when my wig kind of slips a little, it’s very obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked okay.
customer_reviews.text: Got it to go under a wig for Halloween. Worked okay but tore easily.
customer_reviews.author: CMB

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE and FAKE do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible!!!!! If I could give less than one star I would!!! Instead of getting the TWO Wig caps I ordered, I received a lego figurine. Would not buy again, would not recommend! Oh yeah and this item is not eligible for returns! Terrible!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit for under a wig
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back because I no longer had the wig
customer_reviews.author: Gale Bender

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Came with a wig that I sent back. No use to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time keeping wigs in place!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wig caps; they last a long time and keep my wigs in place a lot better than the netted style that I have tried in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I only got one?!?!
customer_reviews.text: I got it today. It fits nicely BUT IT ONLY CAME WITH ONE!!!! I dont want to return it just to get another. I just want them to send me another. Hou get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This worked well, but it would have helped if it had been a bit bigger. I used it on an 11 year old girl with very long and thick hair. I had to pin it because it was a little short on her scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Stein

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have a lot of hair but it stayed in place for several hours

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few uses
customer_reviews.text: For price it is good you can get a few of uses from each cap. Eventually will loosen up

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Secure
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the band. It was stretchy enough to feel comfortable, but still tight enough to feel secure.

customer_reviews.title: great wig caps
customer_reviews.text: i like to wear them around the house it always throws everyone off. great wigcaps that keep my wigs snatched

customer_reviews.title: Came in a pack of two. However, the ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in a pack of two. However, the material in very thin. I hope it wont rip after first use.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Carver

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected under Halloween wig to avoid the itchiness.
customer_reviews.author: Carlee

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: I wore this all day last Saturday and it kept a too small, too short wig from slipping off my head all day. Definitely a must!

customer_reviews.title: Darker than expected, Seam across middle of head
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a halloween costume so I didn't love that there was a seam through the cap. If this is "nude" or "skin color" you must have very tan orange skin to match the color of this cap. Im not sure of the breathability.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Wore one under a wig for a month straight before it started to tear. Only issue is that the color is a little bright and I could see it through the hair line of the wig in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good job!
customer_reviews.text: I have hair that goes down to my lower back. This thing managed to keep all of that contained for 8 hours. Good job!!

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I still have not used this I bought a wig and this. Will probably never wear.

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible cap. It’s incredibly flimsy and slides off constantly. I couldn’t use mine at all.
customer_reviews.author: MariaAna

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it doesn't fit, but when you put it on it works well! I have very thick and long hair, and this holds all of it in. I was impressed!

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to use. Would not stay on. Caused headaches.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give zero stars. Very unhappy with this.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it zero stars because I ordered the skin color wig cap and got dark brown extensions in the mail. I'm super unhappy about it and I don't understand how it is so hard to see the difference between a skin color wig cap and dark brown almost black extensions.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!

customer_reviews.text: they’re soft and functional for the first few uses. they stretch out very easily, as well as develop tears and runs.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality not too small

customer_reviews.text: They were ok, but very thin and flimsy and don’t hold their shape for long, if you have long, thick hair you might want to find a thicker, more durable wig cap.

customer_reviews.title: nice

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be of high quality. it's a plus that it's waterproof and remains very soft and lofty.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here!
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick, and wavy hair so the typical mesh wig cap was no good at keeping my hair ready for a wig. But this one did the job perfectly! Although it took a while to actually ship, it still arrived within the expected time frame. Highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Love these & recommend to all

customer_reviews.text: I'm neutral since I bought this to use with a costume wig. It is a bit thin and flimsy but can't complain due to the price. It did take awhile to get to me though.

customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Would buy more if I ever need to.

customer_reviews.title: worked for my costume
customer_reviews.text: Not super durable, but used it as a bald cap base that I sewed fur fabric to, to make receding hairline sideburns. Held up through multiple parties during Halloween. Stretches to fit a wide range of heads. Breathable and cooler than the solid caps.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was a bit longer than expected, (said there was a problem with the shipping address), but arrived in time. Fit well, and many head items (like headbands) are tight on my head. Definitely makes wig wearing less itchy
